newsitem.title: USA: Parent of Superior Air Parts files chapter 11.
newsitem.headline: Parent of Superior Air Parts files chapter 11.

text.p: SP Holdings Corp, a closely held company which owns Superior Air Parts Inc, filed for Chapter 11 protection Monday.

In papers filed in the U.S. Bankruptcy Court in Delaware, the company said it had no assets and $9.9 million was owed to General Electric Capital Corp for unsecured loans made to Superior. GE Capital is a subsidiary of General Electric Co.
Superior is a distributor and manufacturer of replacement parts for certain types of aircraft engines. Both it and SP are based in Dallas.
